0.text: Welcome to Password Pet! Here we will guide you on tips and tricks to better secure yourself and your data, outside and inside the World Wide Web!

1.text: What makes a password great? most of the time it's a password that is easy to remember, but at the same time not guessable, meaning strong and secure.

3.text: Win or Lose, but most importantly, learn something new and stay vigilant, Enjoy!
